name: Air hockey arcade - Avoid the knights
name_original: Air hockey arcade - Avoid the knights
description:
A completely new way to play air hockey is here!

Slide the puck by tapping the screen, bounce it to the net on each side and collect coins along the way.
Play by yourself or 2 players.
When playing 2 player - simply keep your fingers on each side of the table and work togeher in order to
get as many points as possible and advance on the Air hockey Highscore!

Playing with friends is quite a challenge, but if you work together you could work your way up to the very top of the higscore list at the same time you will have a lovely play time for sure!

This is not the kind of air hockey you pobaly are used to, this is Air Hockey Arcade with a twist in the end.
Bounce bounde and avoid the knights across the table.

Fun classic arcade game style for all ages!
